column4: anyone know how to get a yahoo radio station to work in ubuntu?

yeah but i cant find my radiostations address

but cant seem to find anything

im having a problem booting to a desktop enviro. i just installed kde and set it as my default so i would boot into kubuntu and it shows the loading screen and then goes to a terminal style login and stays in terminal
any idea how to fix it?
im booting from disc at the moment
you don't get to the login screen?
i dont get to the usual one i get to a terminal style one and it stays in terminal
check if gdm or xdm or kdm are running?
so what shows up when you go to ctrl-alt-f7 now?
switches you to where X normally runs, ctrl-alt-f1 should get you back
wait

you'll also want to check /var/log/Xorg.0.log if X is failing to start.  And try to stop kdm and then start it again and see if you get any errors:  sudo invoke-rc.d kdm stop    and to start: sudo invoke-rc.d kdm start
be sure to post that log if you come back :)
the page ubotu linked you to tells you what to do.  If after reading it you aren't sure, let me know
remove the gcjwebplugin package
I just told you
don't paste here.  Use paste.ubuntu-nl.org please
you restarted firefox?
pastebin (do not paste in the channel) the output of 'ls -l /usr/lib/firefox/plugins/'
